properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. PIPELINE OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 15 APR
   BY M/V OCEANICA SUB II ALONG TRACKLINE JOINING
   03-40.66S 038-27.62W, 03-41.08S 038-27.59W,
   03-41.65S 038-27.43W, 03-42.00S 038-27.26W,
   03-42.54S 038-27.06W, 03-43.14S 038-27.66W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 16 APR 15.
